alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gentry; Harrison; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:11AM CDT until August 12 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Worth County in northwestern Missouri... North central Daviess County in north central Missouri... Northeastern Gentry County in northwestern Missouri... Southern Harrison County in north central Missouri... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 111 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Albany, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bethany, Albany, Gilman City, New Hampton, Denver and Martinsville. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 83 and 97. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
